title: may 26: troublesome tweets
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the first time Twitter added warning labels to former President Trump’s tweets. After, she remembers the release of a record-smashing Backstreet Boys album. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
